alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Garfield; McCone; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 10:52PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Intense rainshowers with strong winds will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, south central Daniels, western Roosevelt, southern Valley and northwestern McCone Counties through 1130 PM MST... At 1052 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking intense rainshowers with strong winds along a line extending from 13 miles south of Peerless to 22 miles southwest of Tampico. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Wolf Point, Nashua, Fort Peck, The Pines Rec Area, Duck Creek Rec Area, Lustre, Fort Peck Marina, Hell Creek Rec Area, Frazer, Rock Creek Rec Area, Oswego, Park Grove, Volt, Haxby and Whatley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Garfield; McCone; Western Roosevelt
